title: Ross-Simons Gemstone and .10 ct. t.w. White Topaz Stud Earrings in Sterling Silver
features: Sterling silver, emerald and topaz earrings for women.
4.59 ct. t.w. emerald, 0.10 ct. t.w. topaz. 1/2" wide, 1/4" hanging length.
Post/clutch backing allows for a custom, secure fit.
Square shape green emerald, round shape green emerald and round shape white topaz. Polished sterling silver.

Includes jewelry presentation box. Due to the naturally occurring characteristics of gemstones, each is unique and may exhibit imperfections such as inclusions , blemishes and cloudiness, as well as color variations.
description: Ross-Simons is the authority on luxury classics. Rich sapphire studs are a must in every jewelry box, and this pair offers more dazzle than meets the eye! A velvety duo of 4.90 ct. t.w. square cushion-cut sapphires beam from sterling silver settings, with a shimmery halo of .10 ct. t.w. white topaz rounds. A sparkling surprise: a dimensional double frame of .70 ct. t.w. round sapphires and more white topaz rounds. Post/clutch, white topaz and sapphire stud earrings. Each Ross-Simons item arrives in a fine jewelry presentation box.
